dict.acceptation: 悲哀的；糟糕的；可悲的；令人遗憾的；

sent.orig: Sad is an antonym of happy.
sent.trans: sad（悲哀的）是 happy （愉快的）的反义词。

sent.orig: But SAD is just the tip of the iceberg, explains Terman.
sent.trans: 但是SAD（季节性情绪紊乱）只是冰山一角，特曼解释说。

sent.orig: Antidepressant medication and psychotherapy can reduce SAD symptoms, either alone or in combination with light therapy.
sent.trans: 光照治疗如果与抗抑郁药物、心理疗法其中的一种或两种相结合，将大大减少SAD症状。

sent.orig: Before and after the counseling,they were investigated by using SCL-90,IAS and SAD.
Been webbing could make sad ones happy,and happy ones sad,and sad ones worse,and happy ones better.
sent.trans: 网络可以让开心的人悲伤，让悲伤的人开心；也可以让开心的人更开心，让悲伤的人更悲伤。
